EmailTemplate.name: 2018_EMEAI Hon Ops Conf Geneva.201803_EMEAI_GEneva ops conf Invite_Irina
EmailTemplate.subject: You are invited to join the Honeywell Operators Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | BUSINESS & GENERAL AVIATION HONEYWELL OPERATORS CONFERENCE Geneva Edition Dear Customers and Partners,
On behalf of Honeywell Aerospace and our sponsors, I am pleased to invite you to the 2018 Honeywell Operators Forum! Our general sessions and partner sessions are filled with keynotes and demos that showcase our latest technologies, as well as the mandate updates that you don't want to miss. Please see the event details below.
Date: June 11.2018 Location: Hotel: Mövenpick Hotel & Casino Geneva | 20, route de Pre Bois | 1215 Geneve, Switzerland Agenda:
08:30- 9:00
Registration
9:00 -10:00
Honeywell Customer & Product Support updates
MyAerospace portal orders, Technical Publications, Claims
Products road maps, Repair capability locator
Useful Contacts & Q&A
10:00 - 10:30
Honeywell Protection plans for avionics and engines
10:30 - 11:00
Open discussion
11:00 - 12:00
Lunch
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2018_EMEAIHonOpsConfGeneva_201805.html]]>
We look forward to meeting you in Geneva!
Anna Tomova Customer Support Manager
